definition.value: Use it to store 'media_type' attribute from ISO13606 Attachment

comment.value: It is proposed to add 'language' attribute in ISO13606 Attachment

definition.value: Use it to store 'value' attribute from ISO13606 Attachment
Use it to store 'reference' attribute from ISO13606 Attachment

comment.value: Can be calculated from source ISO13606 Attachment. It is proposed to add 'size' attribute in ISO13606 Attachment

definition.value: Use it to store 'integrity_check' attribute from ISO13606 Attachment

comment.value: FHIR allows SHA-1, 13606 allows SHA-1 and SHA-256. IF SHA-256, the hash needs to be recalculated as SHA-1.

definition.value: Use it to store 'description' attribute from ISO13606 Attachment

comment.value: This information may be lost when mapping ISO13606 Attachment
